pl.wipek.validators

Class Validator

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.wipek.validators.Validator

  • public class Validator
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Krzysztof Adamczyk on 14.04.2017. Validator class which validate object to the required requirements

    • Method Detail

      • validate

        public static boolean validate(java.lang.String str,
                               java.lang.String args)
        Parameters:
        str - string which will be validate
        args - string contains what will be validate in form [rule]:[value]|[rule2]:[value_to_rule2]|... for example: maxLength:10|minLength:3 available pl.wipek.validators maxLength - check String length is equal or shorter than given value minLength - check String length is equal or longer than given value exactLength - check String length is exact to value isValidEmail - check String value is valid Email Address
        Returns:
        boolean true if object meets all the validation requirements otherwise return false

      • maxLength

        public static boolean maxLength(java.lang.String str,
                                int value)
        Parameters:
        str - String which will be validate
        value - is max object [field] length value
        Returns:
        boolean true if object [field] length is equal or shorter than value otherwise return false

      • minLength

        public static boolean minLength(java.lang.String str,
                                int value)
        Parameters:
        str - String which will be validate
        value - is min string length value
        Returns:
        boolean true if string length is equal or longer than value otherwise return false

      • exactLength

        public static boolean exactLength(java.lang.String str,
                                  int value)
        Parameters:
        str - String which will be validate
        value - is length which String length should have
        Returns:
        boolean true if String length is exact to value

      • isValidEmail

        public static boolean isValidEmail(java.lang.String str)
        Parameters:
        str - String will be check is valid Email Address
        Returns:
        boolean true if String is valid Email Address otherwise return false
